mapper.select: SELECT goods.id goods_id, name goods_name, picture FROM goods JOIN goods_picture ON goods.id=goods_picture.goods_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4

select goods.id goods_id, goods.name goods_name, goods.price, amount, description, collect, goods_category.category_three category_id, picture from goods_category join goods on goods.id = goods_category.goods_id JOIN goods_picture on goods_picture.goods_id = goods.id where category_two = #{categoryId} and status = 'up' ORDER BY ${sort} DESC

SELECT goods.id goods_id,name goods_name, price, amount, description, collect , category_two parent_id, picture FROM goods_picture JOIN goods on goods.id = goods_picture.goods_id JOIN goods_category ON goods.id = goods_category.goods_id where goods.id = #{goodsId} and status = 'up'

SELECT goods.id goods_id, goods.name goods_name, price, amount, collect, goods_category.category_two parent_id, picture from goods_category JOIN goods ON goods.id = goods_category.goods_id JOIN goods_picture ON goods.id = goods_picture.goods_id WHERE goods_category.category_two = #{parentId} and goods.`status` = 'up'

SELECT goods.id goods_id,name goods_name, price,amount,description,collect,picture FROM goods JOIN goods_picture on goods.id = goods_picture.goods_id where name like "%"#{keyword}"%" and status = 'up' order by #{order} DESC
